snippet.title: Monolith Requiem of the Ancients - Official Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to PC & consoles early 2024 - Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989320/Monolith_Requiem_of_the_Ancients/

The fate of a world awaits! Journey across Gliese, a mystical world under threat by dark forces in this vibrant, action RPG. Aided by a mysterious presence, embark on a dangerous adventure with the power of the Runic Swarm in your hands. Crush the minions of evil on your path to fulfill your destiny and become the planet’s savior.

NEVER MISS OUT ON NEWS!
SUBSCRIBE: https://bit.ly/2IPMij9 
FOLLOW US: https://allmylinks.com/monolithrota
